name: collectionView(_:validateDrop:proposedIndex:dropOperation:)
desc: Validates the specified location to see if it is a valid drop target.
declaration:

                validateDrop draggingInfo: NSDraggingInfo, 
               proposedIndex proposedDropIndex: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>,
